title: Hanger steak with cauliflower and roasted grapes
description: Nutty cauliflower is a wonderful match to the rich, juicy steak. The grapes provide a lovely sweetness to round off this simple, yet elegant dish.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz red grapes, broken into small bunches
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large cauliflower, broken into florets, stalk roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
